body.p: What type of cell is this?

multiple_choice.choice: This cell is a cardiac muscle cell.
This cell is a red blood cell.

response.feedback: Correct. A cardiac muscle cell must connect closely with other cells in the heart to ensure the heart muscle contracts as a unit to pump blood.
Incorrect. A red blood cell lacks most organelles, including the nucleus. It is a sac of hemoglobin to transport the respiratory gasses oxygen (O2) and carbon dioxide (CO2).
Incorrect. A nerve cell, or neuron, is a critical cell for communication within and between the nervous system and the entire body.

part.hint: Think about what shape the cell would need to accomplish its role - this one must connect closely with other cells to work as a unit.
The primary purpose of this cell is to work with other cells like it to contract.
